languages.text: "Моя работа — спасать жизни. Исцелять раненых офицеров, искать вакцины против палубных эпидемий, отыскивать новые методы целительства. Но... большую часть вахт я занят выслушиванием жалоб пациентов, руководством младшими медикариями и сортировкой больных на значимых и неважных. Весьма... раздражающий довесок к должности Хирургеона маджорис".

"My job is to save lives. Heal wounded officers, develop vaccines for onboard epidemics, discover new methods of healing. However... I spend most watches listening to patients about their many qualms, managing the junior medicae officers, and dividing the afflicted into those who matter and those who do not. A rather... irritating addition to my duties as Chirurgeon Majoris."
languages.original_text: "Моя работа — спасать жизни. Исцелять раненых офицеров, искать вакцины против палубных эпидемий, отыскивать новые методы целительства. Но... большую часть вахт я занят выслушиванием жалоб пациентов, руководством младшими медикариями и сортировкой больных на значимых и неважных. Весьма... раздражающий довесок к должности Хирургеона маджорис".

languages.text: "Ich bin hier, um Leben zu retten. Ich heile verwundete Offiziere, entwickle Impfstoffe gegen Krankheiten, erforsche neue Behandlungsmethoden. Allerdings ... Den Großteil meiner Zeit verbringe ich damit, Patienten zuzuhören, junge Medicae-Offiziere einzuarbeiten und die Kranken in relevante und irrelevante Patienten zu unterteilen. Eine recht ... irritierende Ergänzung meiner Pflichten als Chirurgeum Majoris."
languages.original_text: "My job is to save lives. Heal wounded officers, develop vaccines for onboard epidemics, discover new methods of healing. However... I spend most watches listening to patients about their many qualms, managing the junior medicae officers, and dividing the afflicted into those who matter and those who do not. A rather... irritating addition to my duties as Chirurgeon Majoris."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin hier, um Leben zu retten. Ich heile verwundete Offiziere, entwickle Impfstoffe gegen Krankheiten, erforsche neue Behandlungsmethoden. Allerdings ... Den Großteil meiner Zeit verbringe ich damit, Patienten zuzuhören, junge Medicae-Offiziere einzuarbeiten und die Kranken in relevante und irrelevante Patienten zu unterteilen. Eine recht ... irritierende Ergänzung meiner Pflichten als Chirurgeum Majoris."

languages.text: « Mon métier consiste à sauver des vies, à soigner les officiers blessés, à élaborer des vaccins pour lutter contre les épidémies et à découvrir de nouveaux traitements. Cependant... je passe la plupart de mes tours de garde à écouter les patients geindre pour de petits bobos de rien du tout, à gérer les officiers subalternes de la medicae et à trier les patients selon le degré de gravité de leurs maux. C'est un surcroît de travail des plus... malvenus, au vu de mes nombreuses attributions en tant que chirurgeon majoris. »
languages.original_text: "My job is to save lives. Heal wounded officers, develop vaccines for onboard epidemics, discover new methods of healing. However... I spend most watches listening to patients about their many qualms, managing the junior medicae officers, and dividing the afflicted into those who matter and those who do not. A rather... irritating addition to my duties as Chirurgeon Majoris."

traits.locale_text: « Mon métier consiste à sauver des vies, à soigner les officiers blessés, à élaborer des vaccins pour lutter contre les épidémies et à découvrir de nouveaux traitements. Cependant... je passe la plupart de mes tours de garde à écouter les patients geindre pour de petits bobos de rien du tout, à gérer les officiers subalternes de la medicae et à trier les patients selon le degré de gravité de leurs maux. C'est un surcroît de travail des plus... malvenus, au vu de mes nombreuses attributions en tant que chirurgeon majoris. »

languages.text: «Mi trabajo consiste en salvar vidas. Atender a los oficiales heridos, desarrollar vacunas para las epidemias de a bordo, investigar nuevos métodos de sanación. No obstante... me paso casi todas las guardias escuchando las numerosas protestas de los pacientes, gestionando a los oficiales de medicae más inexpertos y clasificando a los enfermos en los que importan y los que no. Es una carga añadida bastante... irritante para mis obligaciones como Cirujano Majoris».
languages.original_text: "My job is to save lives. Heal wounded officers, develop vaccines for onboard epidemics, discover new methods of healing. However... I spend most watches listening to patients about their many qualms, managing the junior medicae officers, and dividing the afflicted into those who matter and those who do not. A rather... irritating addition to my duties as Chirurgeon Majoris."

traits.locale_text: «Mi trabajo consiste en salvar vidas. Atender a los oficiales heridos, desarrollar vacunas para las epidemias de a bordo, investigar nuevos métodos de sanación. No obstante... me paso casi todas las guardias escuchando las numerosas protestas de los pacientes, gestionando a los oficiales de medicae más inexpertos y clasificando a los enfermos en los que importan y los que no. Es una carga añadida bastante... irritante para mis obligaciones como Cirujano Majoris».

languages.text: 「私の仕事は命を救うことです。負傷した士官を癒し、船内の伝染病ワクチンを開発し、新たな治療法を発見する。ですが…患者の悩みを聞いたり、下級メディケア士官を管理したり、患者を重要な者とそうでないものに分けることに、ほとんどの時間を費やしてしまっているのです。むしろ…チラージョン・マジョリスとしての職務に、苛立つことが増えました」
languages.original_text: "My job is to save lives. Heal wounded officers, develop vaccines for onboard epidemics, discover new methods of healing. However... I spend most watches listening to patients about their many qualms, managing the junior medicae officers, and dividing the afflicted into those who matter and those who do not. A rather... irritating addition to my duties as Chirurgeon Majoris."

traits.locale_text: 「私の仕事は命を救うことです。負傷した士官を癒し、船内の伝染病ワクチンを開発し、新たな治療法を発見する。ですが…患者の悩みを聞いたり、下級メディケア士官を管理したり、患者を重要な者とそうでないものに分けることに、ほとんどの時間を費やしてしまっているのです。むしろ…チラージョン・マジョリスとしての職務に、苛立つことが増えました」

languages.text: “我的工作内容包括救人，治疗受伤的军官，为船上的流行病研发疫苗，寻找新的治疗方法。但除此之外……我还花了很多巡时间倾听病人的不安，管理低阶医务官，将病人按照重要程度进行分类。这些工作也同样是我身为船医总管的职责，而且……相当让人恼火。”
languages.original_text: "My job is to save lives. Heal wounded officers, develop vaccines for onboard epidemics, discover new methods of healing. However... I spend most watches listening to patients about their many qualms, managing the junior medicae officers, and dividing the afflicted into those who matter and those who do not. A rather... irritating addition to my duties as Chirurgeon Majoris."

traits.locale_text: “我的工作内容包括救人，治疗受伤的军官，为船上的流行病研发疫苗，寻找新的治疗方法。但除此之外……我还花了很多巡时间倾听病人的不安，管理低阶医务官，将病人按照重要程度进行分类。这些工作也同样是我身为船医总管的职责，而且……相当让人恼火。”

languages.text: "Benim işim hayat kurtarmak. Yaralı subayları iyileştirmek, gemideki salgınlara aşı geliştirmek, yeni şifa yöntemleri keşfetmek. Ancak... Çoğu nöbetimi hastalarımın sayısız kaygısını dinleyerek, deneyimsiz sıhhiye subaylarını yöneterek ve hastalıklı olanları önemli olanlarla olmayanlar olarak ayırarak harcamaktayım. Başcerrah olarak vazifelerime eklenen oldukça... Siniz bozucu şeyler."
languages.original_text: "My job is to save lives. Heal wounded officers, develop vaccines for onboard epidemics, discover new methods of healing. However... I spend most watches listening to patients about their many qualms, managing the junior medicae officers, and dividing the afflicted into those who matter and those who do not. A rather... irritating addition to my duties as Chirurgeon Majoris."
